key_findings: No pages classified as BAD - all text remains comprehensible
Primary OCR issue: Line-wrapping creates word fragments (e.g., 'guage' from 'language', 'rst' from 'first')
Ligatures render correctly (fi as ufb01, ff as ufb00) across all pages
Foreign language terms (French, German, Greek, Latin) preserved accurately
Philosophical terminology intact throughout, enabling argument recovery
Highest error rate: page 180 (8.5%) - still readable
Lowest error rate: page 172 (3.1%) - excellent quality
Footnote markers preserved correctly as superscript references
